about_the_game:
Unblinking: A Descent into Eldritch Horror

Imagine yourself standing at the cliff of an unfathomable abyss, with the weight of mortality looming over you like a specter. You are a condemned soul, a death row inmate forced to participate in a twisted game of survival. Your goal is not only to escape your fate but to unravel the very fabric of an ancient, otherworldly being. Welcome to Unblinking, a mind-bending game, where the lines between reality and madness are blurred.

In this eerie, thought-provoking adventure, you will navigate through a maze composed of cubes - but not just any cubes. Each one is adorned with unblinking eyes on all six sides, staring back at you like cold, calculating sentinels. These are but no ordinary blocks. They are parts of an eldritch being, an ancient angel whose body you must literally dissect to reach the relic hidden deep within its core.

As you delve deeper into the heart of this monstrous entity, you will encounter increasingly complex puzzles that require wit, strategy, and a willingness to confront the abyssal horrors that lurk within.

But there is a glimmer of hope. If you can successfully navigate this twisted, ever-shifting landscape and retrieve the relic, you will be granted your freedom - a chance to escape the death sentence that hangs over you.

Will you be able to overcome the eldritch horrors that lie within Unblinking, or will you succumb to the crushing weight of madness and despair? There is only one way to find out. Embark on this perilous journey, and discover the terrifying truth that lies at the heart of this ancient monstrosity.

Key Features:

  • A unique, eldritch twist on traditional puzzle solving

  • Unsettling atmosphere and sound design

  • Increasingly complex challenges as you delve deeper into the angel's body

  • A dark, thought-provoking narrative that explores themes of mortality, madness, and redemption

content_descriptors.notes: The player may encounter eldritch creatures in this game. The story contains elements that may depict despair and death through dialogues.

name: Unblinking

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Trapped on death row, unravel the dark mystery of an ancient horror to escape alive. Outsmart the abyss, cheat death - if you dare.
